        Method to create a problem in a XML File
        Parameters:
        title - problem's title
        model - problem's variables
        description - text with problem's description
        waitTime - problem's waiting time
        firstInvalidNumber - first number that limits an interval of values that should not be considered
        secondInvalidNumber - second number that limits an interval of values that should not be considered
